title: Elementary Teacher Professional Development Program Utilizing Online Communities of Practice (OCoP)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Designed for elementary teachers interested in social studies curriculum design and ICT integration, conducted in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Explain the core principles of OCoP (shared learning, knowledge sharing, reflective practice) and apply them to social studies classes.
Design OCoP-based class activities using online collaboration tools (Padlet, Google Workspace, etc.).
Based on the TPACK framework, lesson cases can be developed that integrate technological, pedagogical, and content knowledge.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
